Details:
* Name of the cluster on which you want to deploy Kubernetes.
* This input is case-sensitive. Do not add any special characters except ``_`` (underscore) for the cluster name.

* Indicates if Kubernetes will be deployed or not.
* **Accepted values**: ``true`` or ``false``

* Kubernetes SDN network.
* Required when ``scheduler_type: "k8s"``
                                 
     Choices:                    
                                 
     * ``"calico"``  <-   default
     * ``"flannel"``

* These addresses will be used by Loadbalancer for assigning External IPs to K8s services
* Make sure the IP range is not assigned to any node in the cluster.
* **Sample values**: "10.11.0.100-10.11.0.150" , "10.11.0.0/16"

* Kubernetes internal network for services.
* This network must be unused in your network infrastructure.
* **Default value**: "10.233.0.0/18"

* Kubernetes pod network CIDR for internal network. When used, it will assign IP addresses from this range to individual pods.
* This network must be unused in your network infrastructure.
* **Default value**: "10.233.64.0/18"

* Kubernetes Topology manager policies.
* Accepted values are ``none``, ``best-effort``, ``restricted``, or ``single-numa-node``.
* **Default value**: ``none``

**Example**: ``topology_manager_policy: "none"``

* Kubernetes Topology manager scope.
* Accepted values are ``container`` or ``pod``.
* **Default value**: ``container``

**Example**: ``topology_manager_scope: "container"``

* **Default value**: ``true``.
* With the variable set to ``true``,  all packages and images necessary to set up a Kubernetes cluster are pulled from the OIM local repository.
* With the variable set to ``false``,  all packages and images necessary to set up a Kubernetes cluster are pulled from the internet instead of the OIM local repository. If you set the value to ``false``, ensure that the value of ``enable_routed_internet`` in ``local_repo_config.yml`` is ``true``. To know more, `click here <../CreateLocalRepo/InputParameters.html#opt-omnia-input-project-default-local-repo-config-yml>`_.
